collective.translation[0].definitions[0]: shared or made by every member of a group or society
a collective decision made by all board members
our collective responsibility for the environment
collective.translation[1].definitions[0]: a group of people who work together to run something such as a business or farm, and who share the profits equally
collective.translation[1].definitions[1]: the business or farm that is run by this type of group
collective.translation[2].definitions[0]: a farm or factory that is owned by a government and controlled by the people who work in it
In the 1990s, the collective farm system collapsed in post-Soviet Russia.
collective.translation[2].definitions[1]: This has to be a collective decision.
